body.name: Elementary School Essentials Back to School Kit - School Supplies Bundle - 47 Pieces

byLineInfo.name: Visit the School Supply Boxes Store

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 2 hrs 40 mins
features: Take the worry out of buying school supplies for your elementary student this year with a box that has you covered. This back to school bundle includes (1) 1" binder, (5) 3 prong folders, (1) pk wide ruled loose leaf paper, (1) wide ruled composition book, (3) wide ruled spiral notebooks, (1) 24pk Crayola Crayons, (1) 12pk Crayola Colored Pencils, and (2) Elmer's Disappearing Purple Glue Sticks.

Stay organized and ready for anything with the included (1) pencil bag, (2) pink erasers, (1) pencil sharpener, (6) mechanical pencils, (2) 0.7mm lead refills, (1) pk 100ct index cards, (8) #2 pencils, (3) pencil grips, (6) pencil top erasers, (1) 5" blunt tip scissors, and (1) Kleenex pocket pack.
Taking your supplies to school is easy with the included resealable 12x10x4" box, a great way to keep all of your things neatly organized for that first day of school.

School Supply Boxes also make great gifts for the educators in your life such as elementary teachers, middle school teachers, high school teachers, college instructors, professors, tutors, principals, or school counselors.

Before the school bell rings, make sure to get all the supplies your child needs for kindergarten, first grade, second grade, third grade, fourth grade, or fifth grade and take the hassel out of shopping for school supplies.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Made shopping easy.
reviews.reviewText: Loved not having to run around and find what my grand- daughter needed. No stress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great School Supplies!
reviews.reviewText: This set of school supplies fit the specifications of his teacher. It contained everything he needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The material of the pencil holders is very cheap made. Zipper sticks after some use. Other than that with it for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Convenient, high quality school supplies. I ordered the essential kit (last year and this year). It arrived quickly in a great flip-open box (that I will totally be re-purposing later), with everything my first grader needs for his first day of school. I didn't have to make a day out of running from one picked-over big name store to another picked-over big name store trying to compile enough supplies for him. It is going to be strange with the distance learning plans in place but knowing I have all that he needs in a single box allows me to worry about one less thing. Thanks y'all for helping a momma out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I liked the fact that I could get everything all in 1 box, all in one place. And just about the same price if I would have shopped around. No going to stores, no running out of product etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Se falto insumos
reviews.reviewText: only 40 pieces came, in the description it says that 47 pieces would come. Missing 1 facial tissues and 6 more pieces. there is a pencil kit that was not included in the package.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Back to school shopping done!
reviews.reviewText: I am not going to lie I was a little skeptical at first. But after overthinking it I made my order. Since my order it was at my door in 4days, everything in the picture. Binder, papers, folders, pencils, markers, crayons down to the erasers even added a stress ball. All in the box. My daughter says thank you.
